channel.title: Big Coding Problem! Please Help!
channel.description:
[b]Problem With Coding[/b]
okay, i posted a poll kinda like this one but its a bit different.
how would i go about coding a safezone?
my enitre server is wildy, i want to know how to make it into a safezone (also, just a simple yes or no question, can i change it so it doesn't say "Safezone" or "Wildy"?)
i only have one more question. *how do i make a staff zone? i keep trying but i can't figure it out.. please help
